item.title: forwardemail/forwardemail.net
item.description: Privacy-focused encrypted email for everyone. All-in-one alternative to Gmail + Mailchimp + Sendgrid.

item.title: knadh/listmonk
item.description: High performance, self-hosted, newsletter and mailing list manager with a modern dashboard. Single binary app.
